heroTitle: Yi Rajistar Kajin Ka a Yanar Gizo, Cikin Sauƙi.
heroSubtitle: Hanya mafi sauƙi don yin rajistar kajin kwana ɗaya, masu girma, da manyan kaji a Najeriya. Tsari mai sauƙi, mataki-mataki kai tsaye daga wayarka.
whatWeOfferSubtitle: Zaɓi daga cikin nau'ikan tsuntsayenmu masu inganci don biyan bukatun kiwon kajin ku.
noProductsAvailable: Babu samfuran da ke akwai a halin yanzu. Da fatan za a sake dubawa anjima.
howItWorksSubtitle: Samu kajin ka a matakai 3 masu sauƙi.
step1Desc: Zaɓi tsuntsayenka, adadin, kuma biya ƙaramin kuɗin rajista don samun wurinka a layi.
step2Desc: Manajanmu zai kira ka don tabbatar da rabonka, ranar karɓa, da sauran kuɗin da za a biya.
step3Desc: Ziyarci wurin karɓa a ranar da aka amince, biya sauran kuɗin, kuma karɓi kajinka.
fromChickToMarketSubtitle: Fahimci tafiyar tsuntsayenmu da abin da za ku jira a kowane mataki.
dayOldChicksDesc: Makonni na farko suna da mahimmanci. Kajinmu na rana ɗaya sun fito ne daga manyan wuraren ƙyanƙyashewa, suna ba su farawa mai kyau. Suna buƙatar dumi, abinci na musamman, da kulawa ta kusa.
growerStageDesc: Bayan matakin farko mai laushi, suna shiga matakin girma. A makonni 4, sun fi juriya kuma suna fuskantar girma cikin sauri, suna gina tsarin tsuntsu mai lafiya.
maturityAndMarketDesc: Nau'in kajinmu na nama yawanci suna kaiwa ga cikakkiyar balaga don samar da nama a cikin makonni 5-6 kawai. A wannan lokacin, sun kai ga nauyin da ya dace kuma suna shirye don kasuwa.
loadingProducts: Ana loda samfuran da ke akwai...
bookingStep1Subtitle: Zaɓi nau'in kajin da kake son yin rajista.
noProductsForBooking: Babu Samfuran da Ake Iya Rajista
noProductsForBookingDesc: Manaja bai ƙara kowane samfur don yin rajista ba tukuna. Da fatan za a sake dubawa anjima.
bookingStep2Subtitle: Kaji nawa kake so ka yi rajista? (Mafi ƙanƙanta 1)
bookingStep3Subtitle: Da fatan za a ba da bayanan tuntuɓarka. Manaja zai kira ka.
phoneNumberDesc: Muna buƙatar wannan don kiran ka game da rajistarka.
bookingStep4Subtitle: Duba bayanan ka. Biyan kuɗin rajista yana tabbatar da wurinka a cikin jerin gwano.
importantHowItWorksDesc: Biyan kuɗin rajista yana tabbatar da wurinka a cikin jerin gwano don rukunin da ke gaba. Manaja zai kira ka a {phone} don tabbatar da ranar karɓa da sauran kuɗin da za a biya a ranar karɓa.
confirmationSubtitle: Mun gode da rajistarka. Lambar rajistarka ita ce:
confirmationDesc: Manaja zai kira ka nan ba da daɗewa ba a kan {phone} don tabbatar da rabonka, ranar karɓa, da sauran kuɗin da za a biya a ranar karɓa.
loginSubtitle: Shigar da bayanan ka don shiga asusunka.
loginForTestingDesc: Da farko, yi amfani da shafin Yi Rajista don ƙirƙirar asusun demo tare da ɗaya daga cikin imel na musamman da ke ƙasa. Zaka iya zaɓar kowace kalmar sirri.
signupSubtitle: Shiga AFDEC don fara rajistar kajin ka a yau.
creatingDemoAccountsDesc: Don gwada matsayi daban-daban, yi rajista da imel na musamman da ke ƙasa. Duk wani imel zai ƙirƙiri asusun abokin ciniki na yau da kullun, wanda daga baya CEO zai iya haɓaka shi.
agentPortalWelcome: Barka da dawowa, {agentName}. Ga dashboard ɗin gayyatarka.
referralLinkDesc: Raba wannan hanyar haɗin yanar gizon ko lambar ka don samun kwamitoci.
noCommissionsEarned: Babu kwamitocin da aka samu tukuna.
accessDeniedAgent: Ba ka da izinin duba wannan shafin. Tabbatar ka shiga a matsayin wakili.
errorLoadingAgentData: Ba a iya loda bayanan wakilinka ba.
ceoDashboardSubtitle: Kula da dukkan ayyuka, masu amfani, da wakilai.
managerDashboardSubtitle: Sarrafa dukkan rajista da samfura daga nan.
manageProductsDesc: Ƙara, gyara, da sarrafa tsuntsayen da ke akwai.
userManagementDesc: Sarrafa matsayi da izini ga dukkan masu amfani.
registeredInSystem: An yi rajista a cikin tsarin
accessDeniedAdmin: Ba ka da izinin da ake buƙata don duba wannan shafin. Da fatan za a shiga a matsayin Manaja ko CEO.
errorFetchingBookings: Ba a iya loda rajista ba. Ana iya samun matsalar hanyar sadarwa ko matsala tare da tambayar.
unknownProduct: Samfurin da ba a sani ba
statusUpdatedAndCommission: An Sabunta Hali & An Sarrafa Kwamiti
statusUpdatedAndCommissionDesc: An kammala rajista. An sarrafa kwamiti na {amount} don wakilin.
userManagementSubtitle: Sanya matsayi da sarrafa asusun masu amfani.
accessDeniedCEO: CEO ne kawai zai iya shiga wannan shafin.
noOtherUsersFound: Ba a Samu Wasu Masu Amfani Ba
noOtherUsersFoundDesc: Yayin da ƙarin masu amfani ke yin rajista, za su bayyana a nan.
userStatusUpdated: An sabunta halin asusun mai amfani.
productCatalogSubtitle: Ƙara, gyara, da sarrafa samfuran tsuntsaye da ake iya yin rajista.
noProductsFoundDesc: Fara da ƙara samfurinka na farko ko shigar da bayanan demo.
seedingProductsDesc: Ana ƙara samfuran demo a cikin ma'ajin bayananka.
seedingFailedDesc: Ba a iya ƙara samfuran demo ba. Duba na'ura don kurakurai.
addProductDesc: Ƙara sabon samfur zuwa jerin naka.
editProductDesc: Gyara cikakkun bayanai na samfurin ka.
inactiveProductsDesc: Masu amfani ba za su ga samfuran da basa aiki ba.
footerSlogan: Hanya mafi sauƙi don yin rajistar kajin kwana ɗaya, masu girma, da manyan kaji a Najeriya.
importantBusinessNoticeDesc: Biyan kuɗin rajista yana tabbatar da wurinka a cikin jerin gwano don rukunin kajin da ke gaba. Manajanmu zai kira ka don tabbatar da rabonka, sauran kuɗi, da ranar karɓa.
copyright: © {year} AFDEC Online. An Kiyaye Dukkan Haƙƙoƙi.
navigateToSubtitle: Samu damar shiga manyan sassanmu daga wuri guda.
bookNowCardDesc: Yi odar kajin kwana ɗaya, masu girma, ko manyan tsuntsaye kuma ka tabbatar da matsayinka a cikin jerin.
agentPortalCardDesc: Shiga shafin gayyatarka, bibiyi kwamitoci, da kuma sarrafa kuɗaɗen da ka samu a matsayin wakili mai rijista.
dashboardCardDesc: Don manajoji da Shugabanni. Kula da rajista, sarrafa kayayyaki, da gudanar da asusun masu amfani.
